reviews_data.review_text: Worse experience, avocado melt with out and avocado, grill cheese with cold bread ….

Been going to this restaurant for over a year now. Lacks direction and inconsistent food. Sometimes you get rice that is a bit hard because it wasn't cooked all the way and the taste of the same foods is also inconsistent. I always put NO UTENSILS on my take out orders and yet I ALWAYS find utensils in my bag. Sometimes you don't even get baguettes or any sides with the order because they'd run out. Other times they run out of an ingredient for some dishes. The tea sometimes taste old like it's been refrigerated too long and lost its fresh tea taste or a bit watered do at times. again I have a year's worth of experience eating from here. It's good sometimes but lacks consistency. 2 stars because I like Panera in general.

Luke was so rude at the drive through.  His panties must have been a bunch. They made a mistake on my bill.  They charged me for my birthday pastry He huffed, puffed and say OH MY GOD as if I wasn't there.  I said you all made the mistake not me. He looked at me in the face and shut the window while I was asking him a question. They were yelling in there. It's not the same there. The sandwich was cold and lettuce was wilted on the salad.
Love the Baja bowl and overall fresh food!

Stopped quick to get an afternoon coffee and it was barely luke warm. Brought it back in and she said it would 'be awhile' so I should microwave my coffee. Yeah. Next time I'll spend the extra and go to Starbucks.
I want to say thank you to the wonderful staff here. Brenda, Olavin,. KJ, Katy and the GM Courtney. Top notch service and this is why I choose to come to this location! 5 stars!!

Every time I go through the drive thru, something is either left out of the order completely or it's made incorrectly. Went through today and asked for no tomatoes on the sandwich, it has tomatoes on it when I opened the bag which isn't the biggest deal, but they also didn't put the sauce on the sandwich. Last time, I had to pull around to wait for the food to come out and when she handed me the bag, she took off so quickly that I couldn't tell her they forgot my soda and I had to go inside and get it which completely defeats the purpose of going through the drive thru. It's just always something and I'm out of chances to give.

I don't know what has happened to Panera, but their food has progressively gotten worse and worse. Their "flatbread" is beyond disgusting. They have maybe two soups that are still edible, but other than that, you'll regret eating their food.And their prices are out of control.
Disappointing to get home a realized they put a grilled cheese sandwich in the bag instead of a turkey blt that was ordered.
Panera food seems like it's too good / fresh to be made for drive through. It takes a long time to get your food.
This place is very clean and ambience is very nice. The food is tasty and worth the price !
SWEET TEA WAS NOT SWEET!!!!!!!!!! TASTED LIKE WATER WITH TEA GRAINS IN IT

They have very good sandwiches for a chain restaurant. Have a good selection of bakery items as well.  This particular Panera has all the parking in the front of the store reserved for drive through so you have to park in back and there are very few spots, so generally I park across the street in the main parking lot for the arboretum.
Nice place. Great service and food.
Customer service is always nice but I gave this location a break for a while because the last 2 times I went, my bagels were over toasted and they mixed up special request on 2 sandwiches.

Not the same as before COVID. 1/2 Steak sandwich had one thin grizzley slice of meat and no dissernable amount of cheese. Cesar salad had a tablespoon of dressing and a sprinkle of cheese. There were no instructions on entering the number of your table side electric buzzer that tells you when your order is ready for pickup. Last time we ate there a waiter delivered our order to our table using the same buzzer that in the past told the server where you were sitting. After a very long wait went in from the porch and found our order sitting on the pickup counter. No plans to return!!
Ten minutes wait,wow!!
Yum chocolate croissant!

Awful. Just awful. This “pizza” flat bread pizza was very salty — had sour sauce — and the cheese wasent even melted! The salad was nothing special BARELY ANY DRESSING THOUGH! Also there bread chips is a peace of bread and there croutons were so stale and not even croutons, just cut up bread. The coffee was okay but not really the best the chicken in the side salad had no spice and was dry and chewy. For 34.75 dollars. Not worth it at all.

Can never go wrong with Panera. Great friendly customer service and even better food. I just wanted a simple breakfast this am so I got my fave cinnamon crunch bagel and an iced coffee. Sat inside and enjoyed it and it was as amazing as it always is.
never ever give me my full order even though i pay for it

Honestly, service here sucks. They forget food all the time in the order. They never answer the phone at the restaurant (not during busy hours, called repeatedly and got hung up on). Maybe rating you with a one star will work. I DO NOT appreciate using my rewards when I didn't even get my reward in my bag!!!

Worst Panera bread location by far. Customer service horrible. Always get the wrong order and food quality is not a priority here. I really wish someone from here was paying attention to these reviews. Because they are pretty much all saying the same thing. Terrible!!!
Is the worst Panera Bread in existence , even the manager is extremely rude and   disrespectful,  Do yourself a favor and avoid this location

Ordered car pickup. Received text it was ready and I was already there. 15 minutes later no one came out. I went inside and they said they didn't hear it being ready. Made me new bagels. Got home, they were completely burnt.  Bad experience

By far, the absolute worst sandwich Ive ever had at Panera. Toasted sandwich, including bread, was cold and I was dining in. It was not toasted even a little bit. How can toasted cheese be cold AND mushy???  If I were to base my opinion of Panera on today's visit, I would not return and would warn others of same. Would rate less than one star if possible.

Sadly, this store seemed to think it was a better business model for this night to package all orders to go, and not only that, but not allow anyone to sit down to eat- or even sit to wait for their food if they ordered on kiosk. No explanation was given, which would have been appreciated above all.

Diana was the best drive through cashier! She was so detailed when I ordered dinner for my family of 4, and even helped me use my reward points to get a bagel. Thoroughly appreciated the good customer service!
Went to this location Friday morning and the two ladies working were so pleasant and helpful.  It was a great experience.  Thanks ladies for making our morning!!
Good service

This is the last time I buy food at Paneras.  I ordered a sandwish and a cooiiie.  They put the sandwish in the bag but not the cookie.  This is at least the fourth time this has happened.  Make sure to check your order because the casher sure will not.
This is my favorite location! Best service and great food!!
Food was good as usual and service prompt. There has been a few menu changes, but options are available.

I got excited thinking about getting some oatmeal this morning. So I drive to the location at the Arboretum shopping center in Charlotte NC. The internet, the front door of the restaurant and the automated message when I call the restaurant phone number all say the restaurant opens at 6:00 AM. However, when I pull up to the drive through at 6:18 AM, the message that comes across the speaker says the restaurant is closed. Nope, I won't be coming back to this place. Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice... I don't think so.
Slowest drive-through ever! I waited 15 minutes for a small mac & cheese!
I love Panera, but since they have sold out to DoorDash Delivery their delivery has become horrible. The food is always late and always cold.

My experience with you all has been very disappointing the first time I came you got my order wrong I called over and over again no one answered the phone I wanted to speak with a manager to get my order replaced or corrected. And I have tried you again only to be disappointed even further my chips were not in my bag with my U-Pick2. Employees outside in front of the door smoking cigarettes very unprofessional customer service when I went in to get my chips the young girl behind the pickup Cafe had a horrible attitude and  threw  the chips on the counter. I did go back into speak with a manager. Young people if you're working in customer service please remember that customer service is the number one thing that you're supposed to have is excellent customer service enjoy helping others and serving others or get a new job. She also threw the top to my drink and instead of them having any small cups one of the guys handed me a coffee cup to fix my drink because he said they ran out of small cups so when I had to come back  to get a top the same rude little girl through the top on the counter thank God I'm saved Lord knows it's very sad how y'all young folk act today it's very sad and all I can do is say help your parents cuz I can only imagine what they go through someone so disrespectful on the job I can only imagine what you're like at home thank God you're not my child is all I can say today. I definitely will not be coming back to this location ever again.
Got the sesame bagel and the bagel was hard as a rock- I couldn't eat it. Definitely not fresh.
Very disappointed in chicken salad sandwich. It was just sliced chicken with some celery and almonds. It did not hold together and no flavor.

Just ordered this through drive-thru super soggy and no chicken on it at all and this was disgusting I opened it right in the parking lot after getting it and I always get this sandwich at other Panera's do not recommend this Panera at all!!! The only thing edible was my tea and chips.
Food was good...
They absolutely never answer the phone

Just received an online order only to have little bugs ALL over our pastries, napkins and somehow, drink. I then tried to call the restaurant 3 times only for the phone to hang up on me where I can't leave a voicemail to let them know this issue. They just lost a regular customer :(
I just went through the drivethrough and the manager was disgusting and RUDE! I will reporting this experience to her general manager!!

Went there for lunch.  Ordered a small mac n cheese & whole chicken Caesar salad.  Paid $16.32.  The salad is tiny.  Not sure if they gave me a half or not.  Never had a salad there before.  Seems awful small for that price. Either way I was already home and wasn't going back.  Also the brown rotting lettuce was a nice touch.  Won't be back

Placed web order at 8:01 PM on Saturday 8/7 with a requested pick up time of 8:45 Order #606360431Received email at $8:07 that my order was ready. When I asked why my order was ready more than 30 minutes early, the response i got was we start web orders as soon as we get them. I produced a screen shot of my order details including pick up time. Again I was told that the web orders are started as received. I replied that I did not care about the internal processes and that I can reheat the food after i drove 15 minutes to my destination. I was there at 8;40 PM. I got an apology and an offer to remake anything that was not hot. Thats when I left. I am not going to unpack my order and taste test everything to make sure it was hot. It was made 30 minutes before the requested time. I have not been in a store or ordered for sometime due to Covid. Do not send me a pastry voucher I will not be back.

I like Panera bread. And I don't like bashing people for small mistakes but today when I got my daughter the kids meal with yogurt, I didn't check the date, it was over a MONTH EXPIRED. So she slurped it up before I could get home just to tell me her tummy hurt. My first reaction was to call them just to let them know and maybe throw it all out and not serve to any more children, however after listening to a never ending ring for over 10 minutes and then have my daughter throw it all up I just want someone to know. Check all their dates when purchasing from this location.

Ordered 2 bacon chicken chipotle flatbread pizzas. This one had no cilantra or chipotle sauce. Tried calling the store directly but the call kept hanging up after a few rings. Not very happy right now 😡
Somehow it didn't go through the system that we wanted our bagel sliced and with cream cheese but the team went out of their way to serve us. Really solid service!
This is a nice place to hold a tutoring session, but I wish they'd turn off the patio area's heat lamps. Why do you need those on during the spring and summer?

I'm a huge Panera fan. I regretfully say I'm not fond of this location. I placed an order for an iced coffee and it was dripping wet with it completely watered down. It taste like water with a hint of coffee taste. I will not be be revisiting this location for my pick me up coffee.
I liked vegan options here

CURBSIDE PICKUP didn't go well today. I waited for 30mins for my regular coffee order. Finally, I went inside and my order was sitting at the ONLINE ORDER station unfilled. I gave my cold and nearly empty cup to a barista who filled it with coffee. She apologized, but no other car expecting curbside pickup got car delivery. We all had to go inside. Unacceptable
Always good!

They don't answer the phone and regularly leave items out of to go orders. I would chalk it up to being understaffed buy Panera is a pretty big chain and they're not too busy to never answer their phones
Panera Arboretum is really wonderful the food is great and the service is amazing and it is clean too
Very good place!! I like it !
Kind server, quiet and relaxing dining.
Very friendly, fast service, nice environment
Delicious Gourmet soups
I'm sorry but $6 for a couple noodles?? This isn't New York City  lol it's fast food

I placed a curbside order and they never came out. Waited 45 minutes, tried to call them 3 times with no answer. Finally drove up to the drive thru window and still no one opened the window. I even waved and no one came. Finally drove through again and someone noticed. If I could leave no stars I would.
I rather drive to the waverly and Ballantyne location way better and faster service
Always great service at Panera.

This location is the slowest; the rudest. Be careful if you complain about slow service or else an employee will follow you out to the parking verbally accosting you. Though looks like I'm NOT the only one who feels the service is slow and poor.
Definitely the slowest service in Charlotte.  Update: Went back, and the service was faster. Ordered the chipotle chicken breakfast wrap. They forgot the chicken....
There was a misunderstanding with my sandwich and the workers were really understanding and gave me the right one for free. Just wanted to say thank you and it was very much appreciated!
Said Dine in was open on google maps and we get there and dine in isn't available very disappointed.
The man in the takeout window wore his mask below his nose. When I asked him to cover his nose, he did so. Not the way to operate a pick up and pay window.

Tonight I ordered online ahead of time and went to pick up my chipotle chicken flatbread. They could not locate my order in the system once I arrived. I showed them the confirmation on my phone and They promptly began to make a new order for me. Then they realize that my order must've been given or picked up by the wrong person because the cook had just made it. While I was waiting for them to make the new order they came out and brought me some free pastries to take home and said sorry for the confusion & wait. I appreciated that very much. A lot of places don't do things like that to compensate anymore. It meant a lot to me and made the experience a positive one. The flat bread tasted wonderful. It's priced very fairly too as it was more than enough for two meals. Thank you Panera! I will gladly return to the Arboretum location!
Loved the Steak and white cheddar sandwich!!! Picked onions with a horseradish mayo! Delicious! Dont forget the prickly pear hibiscus cooler. So refreshing.

Panera has really gotten cheap and skimpy. It's very expensive for very little.  The new barbecue chicken sandwich had barely any meat on it lots of bread and not much sauce. Taste good but skimpy for the price. Stick with the big goods in the coffee

Did order pickup and my order was wrong I called eight times no answer. They clearly have mangers for no reason. They say someone checks every bag but some how it was still missing multiple soups. Their soup isn't cheap so they should make sure the orders are correct.
Missed two of my items when I ordered them on the drive through

Food is amazing and service is great. The prices are a bit high but fresh food is worth it. I just wish they'd bring back the sea salt focaccia bread loaf, it was my favorite and it's been discontinued.

I ordered delivery due to being quarantined and my order came without my sandwich, the main part of my meal. When I called they asked if I wanted them to send someone back out with it but it was 30 minutes to closing, being in the service industry I felt bad having them do that. She said she would have a manager call me back regarding a refund. He called later and explained he couldn't refund without me being in store, which I understood so he offered to send my a voucher. I never received the voucher. I'm sorry but Panera is too expensive for stuff to be missing and not be refunded.

With restaurants reopening somewhat cautiously, this Panera is trying to bring business back in. About 40% occupancy, food is no longer (for now, I assume) being brought to the table, you have to go pick it up at the kitchen counter. As for the rest, same menu and prices of old. Friendly staff, good quality food. Ample parking, since most shops are in open shopping centers.
A couple mile walk this morning to breakfast with the kiddos.... Good experience

Glad they are open for indoor eating but wish their food was as good as the photos looked.  Bacon half raw, cheese not melted on bacon melt sandwich and tables not cleaned every 30 minutes as noted on each table.   I cleaned my own off with travel wipes.  Staff was friendly.
I was disappointed with the salad I ordered for lunch.  My Green Goddess Cobb Salad had lettuce mix, tomatoes and chicken. No bacon, avocado or egg. Usually food is quite good here.  🙁

I got a strawberry poppyseed chicken salad to go after a very busy day. By the time I got a chance to open it, it was an hour later. No chicken. Just an overpriced bowl of lettuce and a handful of fruit. Tried calling several times but they don't answer the phone. Most expensive lettuce I ever purchased. I won't be back.
You can order online - coffee is not served very hot - mostly lukewarm
Waited for 12 minutes after my iced coffee should have been ready. Then was delivered a dripping mess. I don't recommend using the app for this location. Drive thru would have been much faster.

I decided to try their coffee as I did not see my usual places close by this area. I had been enjoying the coffee til about mid way thru I sucked a fly up thru the straw. The fly was dead indicating to me it had been present in the coffee the whole time. Most disgusting coffee experience I've ever had.
Great vanilla late and easy drive through
Fresh,delicious food
Our salads were half full:( I always seem to have trouble at this location
Before leaving, check your order. Before eating, check for hair. Before calling to complain and get a refund for your incomplete order, don't expect anyone to pick up.

Coming home from a long shift at work as an ICU nurse during covid- I came here today and picked up my food and got home and saw they gave me the wrong order. They were already closed but I called them and drove all the way back anyways and they gave me my correct order, told me to keep the other food- and then gave me several pastries as an apology. They were so sweet about it and amazing. Thank you so much you guys 💛
Love this place. I recommend the coffee and the bacon grilled cheese and tomato soup.
Food
Service was extremely slow
Panera Arboretum has good service and consistent quality with their food.
Everyone here is always helpful and friendly.
Amazing food,
Great food great service good prices
overpriced not worth it
Good food but a bit pricey.

Don't waste your time coming her for lunch. No where to sit to eat as most tables are being used by squatters who are having meetings or kids doing homework. They do not leave and sit for hours.  This is not a social house. Eat and leave please.
Ordered on the app, large order of bagels with tubs of cream cheese. Was sent the little cups instead. Tried calling three separate times, was hung up on each time. Horrible service.
Nice experience. Ordered the chicken noodles soup, tasty and nutritious.
Great but 4 because it's too expensive for lunch

I just went to drive through at Panera bread in pineville Matthews and ordered the chipotle chicken avacado melt and they did an excellent job of it it was so yummy and the avocados were not mushy it was very fresh and the bread was toasted to perfection. And I wasn't aware that they had a hot coffee mocha available at Panera until the employee at the drive through gave me an option of order a hot coffee mocha which was just awesome. Keep doing what you're doing I will go to this location more often now that I'm aware of the excellent service they offer. Bravo!! 5 stars indeed!
Love the fresh food

I like Panera but this location need to do better. I've been meeting with friends monthly to play cards & have dinner on the patio for over a year. It seems like they are always out of something. This month was bread for a sandwich I ordered, last month was soup & prior to that a salad item. If it wasn't for the location they'd probably be closed.
Fantastic management and customer service. Perfect to work in, either solo or with small groups, during the morning.
Did not receive any of the sides that came with our three meals. And hard to find the Mac in the cheese...see picture. Friendly staff though

We was here at 7.45 am for breakfast, unfortunately it was a bad experience,waiting over 26 minutes for our food and it was confusing, because our order it wasn't served not even ready the kitchen team was confused,  don't have a clue what was what or whom. We was a party of 7  from Atlanta GA
How do you not take to go orders over the phone anymore when there is specifically an option to do so when calling in?
I like Panera.  Always enjoy a good bagel and cream cheese. Staff is friendly and the facility is always clean.  Can't ask for much more when looking for a quick meal or snack.
Great fast service!
Very fast Drive-thru. Employees were very professional and kind when approaching the window. Food as fresh and hot.
Great!
Chipotle chicken avacado panini is delicious!!!   It does not come up.on your menu?   Its your best sandwich!!
Satisfying!
Love Panera!

A few weeks ago I got off work and went through the drive through to get dinner for myself and boyfriend to bring home. I ordered a pick 2 meal, and only got the cup of soup, my sandwich and side item were completely missing. When I realized this upon returning  home, I called to complain to the manager. He was unable to give me a refund over the phone since I paid in cash, so I was given the option to have a few Pick 2 coupons mailed to my house to make up for the missing items in my last meal. It's been almost 4 weeks and I've yet to receive a coupon. This is not the first time I've had food missing or gotten the wrong order completely.  It's very frustrating to continually have sloppy employees and even more frustrating to be promised compensation and never get it. I work in the same shopping center, but now I go out of my way to order from other locations. This one is always disappointing.
The food is always excellent but a little pricey
Good food quality. Slow drive-thru though

Are you need an area to study or get work done?  Are you wanting a nutritionally dense meal that will leave you feeling good after you eat it?  Well head on over to this Panera Bread!  This one is located in the Mathews Arboretum where there are plenty of places to walk around and things to see.
This is a wonderful place to stop for lunch. They have wonderful soups salads and sandwiches and on a pretty day you can eat outside in the shade under the umbrellas.
Always good
horrible service
Delicious food!
Great food. Definitely on the expensive side, but healthy.
Excellent
(Translated by Google) I loved the bread and coffee  (Original) Me encantó el pan y café
Fast , Accurate and Polite.
Broccoli chedder soup was so delish, David in the kitchen was so awesome! Thanks for the experience.
There were flies in with the pastries. And while trying to eat my dinner, there were flies trying to get on my food. And I wanted a vanilla cinnamon roll....too bad
This place is too pricey I got a sandwich a bowl of soup and a drink and it was over $20 will not be back

Who doesn't love Panera Bread. Their bread bowls with whatever kind of soup you want to put in it are unbelievably good. I suggest trying to Cinnamon Crunch bagels with a Honey Nut cream cheese. Delicious!

This Panera is constantly out of whatever it is I want to order.  this isn't the first time, the second time, or even the third time that this has happened to me at this Panera.  Honestly, if it weren't for location, I would go elsewhere.
Very over priced and super small portions.
Always great customer service awesome bread bowls.  Very good Panera!

I am a fan of Panera Bread, but I have to say that some of the locations are POORLY managed, such as the store 14835 Ballantyne Village Way. There are some locations like the store 3207 Pineville-Matthews Rd, Charlotte, NC 28226 where the management and the staff like the cashier Ms. Makayla Meeks can change your not so good day to a superb day!!  The way employees greet the customer I believe is very important and help businesses to bring the customer back. This employee of Panera Bread gives you the smile and warm welcome on every visit, and ensure that you are happy with the order.  Unfortunately too many people are working as store managers, but how many of these people know the importance of customer service, and reward their employees.
Never had a poor delivery

Place is nice and clean, food is good usually.  I lower rating is because they deliver toasted bagels to your table now...toasted things are usually only good while they are hot...my usual carbonation experience relishes the hot butter melting on a cinnamon crunch bagel.  I used to get it right at the counter but now it gets toasted, sits a bit, so it loses both the toastedness and warmth of the bagel until it is delivered.  I would be more satisfied waiting the 39 seconds to have it toasted at the counter.  I know I could get up and stand in line again and get another one but alas, I figure this will make a longer process change.

The food is always good here. I give it 3 stars because the outer eating area was messy, is every time I come here. The other reason is due to the price. I was appalled that two pick-2 meals and 2 fountain drinks cost over $30!!! I could go to a sit down restaurant and pay the same for two meals with drinks and tip! I am aware that Panera says their food is "clean" and the taste is great, but I am sad that I will no longer be able to afford to eat here. When did Panera get to be a place that I had to save up to  in order to go for lunch?!
The chicken on my sandwich had so much fat/skin part on it I almost vomited. It was DISGUSTING! I should've taken it back to get all my money back. I just won't go to them again.
Very friendly place with great service and delicious food!!!
Love the green goddess Cobb salad and I like that they have single stall bathrooms.
Typical Panera, I am a regular.
Always great
They have awesome bagels. And the people there are very friendly too.
Brocolli and cheddar soup is the best
I love their bagels! I always get hot tea. Very relaxing atmosphere!
You can never go wrong with Panera. Good, clean, healthy food options, and the bakery takes care of your sweet tooth.
Great service
Nasty Food they Don't wash there hand after going to the Bathroom.
I was not a Pamera
Very good food, excellent service.

Good place to eat, pleasant atmosphere, friendly staff. However, there is something fundamentally wrong paying 6 bucks for a grilled cheese sandwich, and 8 bucks for a bowl of vegetable soup. With a large coke my bill was 17 dollars. There is a grocery store across the way and for 17 bucks you can buy all that food to last a week. I'm in the wrong business.
The employees have passion for their job
Its a panera... what do u want me to say.. its good food, relaxing atmosphere, and clean bathrooms.
The best
Great food & good service always
Great food. Good service.
It is never as good as I think it will be
Everything is healthy  Especially the broccoli and  Cheddar soup which is the only thing that I ever get
(Translated by Google) delicious  (Original) Deliciosos
Good quality and fast service.
Went one time with friends ,a disappointment
Unimpressive
My favorite healthy "fast food " restaurant

The only difficult thing for this location is it's location in the parking lot. They have a drive thru which sacrifices space from the parking, so unless you park in the first 3 or 4 spots you have to park behind the building or I just parked in the parking row across the street. Clean restaurant, my order was correct which was a Fuji apple chicken salad.
Way over priced and super small portions

This location is average. The employee at the bakery is usually friendly but slow. Items are consistently missing from my pickup order. The Drive thru has been great- only option is cash tips though 😔 and they usually earn one.

Got a kids to go order and when we got home found the yogurt was missing the apple juice box had no straw. I called backed and ask them to bring a correct meal to the house  approximately 4 miles away the manager said was not it their delivery zone. They would only offer a coupon by mail! My answer was how does that satisfy a 2 year old wanting yogurt and drink the juice. Absolutely no help and  then hung up on me. Now that's a real manager solving a customer concern that was store mistakenly. NEVER GO AGAIN AND I SUGGEST OTHERS FIND SOMEWHERE ELSE!!
Great food, and great atmosphere!
Good food.
Panera Bread is one of the place where you get lot of Veg options. good job guys, keep it up.

Not impressed at this location.  9:30ish and had a very small selection of bagels, coffee was cold, no cream/milk.   Waited a while before staff refilled. Location was not very clean like others I've been to.
Coffee is good
Great sandwiches. Price could be better.
EXTREMELY slow service, the food was ok. But the services was terrible. Took forever for two simple menu items to be brought out to us.
Panera got it right marking to women, jeez the estrogen is so thick here. Lots of carbs the ladies love!
The favorite mac and cheese of my son
Overrated & overpriced.

I used the self service tablets to order my food and grabbed a pager and sat down. It took shy of one hour to receive my food and they forgot my danish. Easy fix, I went to the counter and requested one, but I felt it was a very long wait time nonetheless. It was a busy day, but next time I see it busy I will order ahead. Food was great, as usual.
Excellent food.... very nice clean dining area... express ordering
Best
Good food  Nice staff
That's another fast food restaurant a little better quality food but still the same quick-service get out and you never know what you're eating although they profess to say it's healthy
A nice location of this chain! The staff was very nice. There is a really large covered patio for dining, which is definitely a great feature of this location.
I am very pleased with this restaurant.

Awful...forgot food in the order after drive through employee claimed to have double checked.  Called 3 times to speak to manager, finally got through an hour later still waiting for manager to call me back.  Don't ever go there.  Horrible customer service.

They deliver! Using their app & having them deliver soup when 2 people in your household have colds was perfect! They ran out of soup yesterday (they apologized and offered to give me something else to which I turned down because all I wanted was soup) so we tried again today. I ordered much earlier than yesterday. The man who bought it to us was very kind & helpful.

Love that they have a drive thru...makes stopping to get a quick bite with two littles much easier. Food is always good! Staff is usually friendly. ETA: This location had gone downhill for a few months. I visited a handful of times and there was always an issue with my order and the staff was horrible. However, the last two visits I have made I have been impressed. They have stepped up their game! The staff is friendly. My order has been correct, hot, and delicious! So glad they got it together because I was starting to lose faith.
French Onion Soup & mac...Yum!
They messed up my order.. But the Manager fixed it the next day for free!

Sandwiches and salads are delicious. Fresh and made to order. Substitutions no problem. The problem? All of their soups taste like a mouthful of salt and make me thirsty for the rest of the day. Pass.
Parking is difficult at Panera, but the service is great and they have a nice enclosed outdoor patio area year round
Service was good. Food the usual. Limited seating though
Service outstanding
Terrible service and constantly get order wrong.
I got a huge chicken salad. Tasty enough but there was no differentiation of flavors...everything had the same flavor, more than likely covered by the balsamic dressing. 5 out of 10.
Food is awesome... Lines were long with only one register open
Going down

Spent over $35 on a lunch order and was missing a portion of my order when I got home. It took me calling NINE times to even get anyone to pick up the phone and the resolution was come get my sandwich and a gift card for another sandwich. The manager barely apologized and didn't even offer to deliver the order even though Panera has delivery. When my husband picked up the order the manager refused to speak with him and gave us no gift card. His employees shared that he also treats them poorly - shocking! His excuse by phone was they were busy, but I called from 2:15 - 2:35 without anyone picking up and when my husband walked in the place was empty. Owners should be aware of who they are paying to run their investment.
The breakfast sandwiches are good here. It's best to go early so you do not miss out on the variety of pastries.
Nice location good food
Order is hardly ever right or made well
The food here is nice and fresh, cooked to your order. Clean and pleasant atmosphere. Friendly wait staff.

Not very happy with this place. I placed an online order for my lunch around 11:30 AM and chose the 12:45-1:00 PM delivery time. At 12:12 PM I received a text notifying me that my order was on its way and my driver was Kevin. At 1:05 PM I still had not received my order so I called the restaurant and spoke to the manager, David, just to see about how long it would be so I could plan for it. He apologized and said he would get in touch with Kevin and find out where he was at. At 1:33 PM I called back and spoke to David again and told him to just cancel my order because I had to get back to work. He apologized again and said he would get it canceled for me but made no attempt to correct the situation at all. Very disappointed in the service at this location and that I wasted my lunch break waiting for my order.  Edit: Because I had to close the office at my job that night, I decided to reorder online for my dinner since I did not have lunch. I chose the 4:00-4:15 PM delivery time and it arrived on time and Kevin apologized for what had happened with my first order. He said he was the only delivery driver and had several orders to deliver around lunch time so he got behind. Understandable, but it would have been nice to have been notified by the manager when I called the first time, that they were running behind.
Good food and service

Just sat in the drivethru for 5 min, no one was working. Came inside, no one working... guy was standing in line with his daughter for a while. I had to go find someone to help us. Apparently someone didn't show up for their shift according to them!? They were all playing around and not working. Finally had it with this location, not coming back. Where's the manager? Obviously not one!
Busy lunch spot. Food was good.
Blunt sandwiches. Quality food but not hardly any taste.
Pic 2.  That's me
Ordered a grilled cheese and what I was given were two grilled slices of bread with a little semi-melted cheese in the middle. Not what I expect from Panera. I'll take my money else where.
Soups are the best. Service was ok. Clean and nice
The team at this Panera are always friendly, fast, and helpful. Great location, service and healthy fresh food!
brenda was a extremely rude dont go here she called me fat. shes old and was like “your gonna eat all that” with a judgemental face. the food cost 31 dollars for two meals
Good food and family friendly. But Drive thru is very slow
Excellent food, worst Customer services!!!

Person who rang me up looked like she wanted to die. Took 20min to get my food and the soup was cold, obviously everything was sitting there for a while. The entire place was empty so it's not like it was busy.

The food is good of course but I find service at this location to be sub par.  At the moment 9 rapid delivery pickups are still being prepared.  Last visit here the cashier wasn't very knowledgeable and our order came out wrong twice.  But saving grace is the food is uniformly good.
Pretty good stuff that you could make at home but don't want to.
I Just get a kids meal grilled cheese sandwich, the order was to go, when I opened I found the sandwich burn and hard as a stone . How somebody can eat that?

I had the flu and I wanted a grill cheese and tomato soup. My family got Hardees so all we got was a fruit cup, grill cheese, and soup for me. I open my meal and half of my grilled cheese was burnt to the crisp. I can normally eat burnt stuff but I couldn't eat it. The outside crust was so burnt i had to take all the crust off and only ate the middle.
It was a bit empty and cold. Otherwise it was typical for a store like this

I pulled in the drive thru last night, ordered two large coffees, pulled up to pay and was told they were out of coffee. It was 9:35 p.m. when I was told they were out. I went next door to McDonald's where they had fresh coffee just made.  And, no apologies or excuses at Panera's for "out of coffee." No thank you for stopping, etc.
Excellent service and food was excellent cashier and server were very gracious.
During busy periods, they get orders wrong more than right.
Very slow drive through, just got a bagel and smoothy and I sat at the window for 10 minutes, ughh!

The drive thru at this place needs two windows. One where you receive your food, and the other where they fix all the mistakes they made with the order. We're on a streak of 3 consecutive drive thru trips where they screwed something up or forgot something all together. This place is a joke.  I'd like to meet the sorry mistake for what they call a GM.  He or she is about as bright as the idiots that work the windows and in the kitchen.
Pretty decent store.  Not keen on the location, though the store runs very well.  They're efficient and accurate with their orders, and there is plenty of seating both inside and out.
Friendly staff, and great food. Too loud to be able to sit and work because of the seating arrangements.

Poor service.  Ordered a sausage egg and cheese. The sausage was burned in the first. I took it to the manager. No apology was given. Second sandwich had no cheese. This Panera consistently disappoints.
Great food!
Great salads
Good food and.ok service
Food is always fresh. The Manager was very nice as well as the other employees.
Nice place for meet ups.
Food is perfect, wait has never been too bad for me.  The staff here are great, I recently had an issue with my online order, and the manager was extremely friendly and helpful.
As always the food is good. But the drive through wait is terrible. NOT FAST FOOD. Don't be in a hurry when you drive through.
Always good food and service
Excellent food and service.
Best cheese bread EVER!

Panera location is very busy most of the day. Parking lot area fills up quickly since store is in a big shopping center so be prepared to find parking by the Walmart. Good service and good wi-fi for the most part.
Good is great but again, food missing from the order.  This has happened both in store and drive thru :(

Love the food, but the wait can be bad during lunch hours on weekdays. Also, I like to use the drive through on weekdays; and they consistently miss something or another with the order, so make sure you check it before you leave. What's the deal with this display at the delivery window; it's been broken for the last 3 months.
They are normally really good but the lady that took my order was extremely rude and cut me off mid order but when I went to pay they had switch people.
They lost my takeout order and they never have anything in stock. When it is in stock it is good but otherwise I got to a different Panera such as the one in arboretum.

I love Panera Bread. I have to make myself not go there everyday. The food is always fresh and very good. It does not matter what I get; soup, salads, or a sandwich, I am.always satisfied. I cannot wait for the next time that I GET to go to Panera Bread.
The best soups
Great variety for a drive-thru! Pricey-ish but worth it.
It's alright. Salad I had wasn't all that great. Lettuce was a little wilted. But. Sandwich was great.
Their Tomato Soup is just what I needed on a cold day!

My husband and I ate at Panara's this past Wednesday night, 1/4, and had a difficult time finding an empty table due to the fact that there were a lot of tables being.taken up by young adults on their laptops with their work books.  We made the decision to eat on the patio, which I regretted the moment we sat down, because the temperature was quite chilly.  There should be a designated area for those who want to do school/business work.  Should have taken our meal home to eat in a warm kitchen.
Quick service, especially since it is always crowded. Overpriced for sandwiches that are average

Limited number of tables. Eating in the patio area is not a good experience when the outside temp at Noon is 29 degrees and they can't close the weather panels because they're broken. At least make an effort to close them up with a temp solution, and offer those who have to sit out their a free cookie or something. Food is good, customer service not so much.

After my best friend gave birth she really wanted panera. Pulled up tonight 20 minutes before close. Not only were they out of all soups but the man taking my order was very rude the whole time.  If you're going to stay open till 10, be willing to offer a full menu till 10. If you're not going to be nice to customers until 10, don't work the closing shift.  I also didn't get the cookie I ordered.
Love the menu light and clean food. Really good quality meals, quick on the drive trough and friendly service.
Very organized
Clean, friendly and efficient
Great meeting place. Nice lobby. Modern design.
This is a nice place
Great friendly service food was fresh and quick

None of the power outlets work. If you plan on spending sometime and will need to charge your computer, go somewhere else. When I told the manager I had tried 3 different outlets, and that I was having issues, he was extremely rude and simply said "I know they don't work. They aren't meant to". I guess the outlets they have by various tables are more for the esthetics rather than functionality?!
Fresh, everyday
BBQ Chicken Salad is delicious!

One of my go-to places when in a time crunch. Voted one of the best quality meats in the fast food industry, the food is generally healthy and nothing compares. Nice folks, easy ordering too. Online option is quick as is the kiosk in-store.  Plenty of seating including an outdoor option. Good place to relax and even read a book.
Wifi, stay as long as you want, tasty fresh healthy options as well. Great rewards program.
Love the breakfast and lunch selections. Plus they deliver now which helps with healthier lunch choices.
Love this place
Typical Panera Bread, good food in a nice comfortable casual atmosphere.   Good for family/friends and business.
WOW TALK ABOUT CUSTOMER SERVICE! Javantie was great! He was professional and all about the customer. Thanks for a great experience! plus the food was great as always.
Twice they have left out sandwiches we have gotten through the drive through.  I would double check before you leave.  The food we got was good.
The blonde girl working the drive-thru is always very rude. Horrible attitude and constantly rolling her eyes. We love panera, but will definitely never be returning to this location.
(Translated by Google) Delicious  (Original) Delicioso

Food was DELICIOUS! Service was HORRENDOUS!  Absolutely terrible service by "Shekma". She couldn't care less about me not getting my food, or a drink cup, or a pager, or that I was courteous throughout the entire ordeal. I had a perfect opportunity to explode, and I didn't. Merry Christmas.

The service is excellent. We went there and unknowingly ordered a food that one of us was allergic to. When we told them, they remade the dish, and gave us some cookies, all at no charge. Now that's what I call service!
